posts.post_content:
Posted By: Jeff W.
I need a T206 Christy Mathewson Portrait in PSA 2-3 or SGC 30-40 to complete my NY Giants sub-set. I lost out on a beautiful Matty last night on ebay so I am hoping that I will find one here! Please email me if you have one available.

Thanks for looking
Jeff W.
jwilliams81@mac.com

Posted By: E
I know which one you're talking about.  It really was a beauty.  Good luck in your hunt.

Posted By: Jeff W.
Yeah, the Matty that ended last night was gorgeous for a 2 and I was about $20 off of the winning bid. I am crossing my fingers that I will be able to find the card here!

Jeff W.

Posted By: Anthony Buzzi
I have a very nice Mathewson Portrait (SGC 30) that I will be willing to part with.  I don't know what you are willing to spend but I am asking $400 delivered.

I will be happy to send scans if interested.
